Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to authorizing the New York state energy research and development authority to administer a program to provide grants related to enabling switching residences to electric heat pumps
Summary: Authorizes the New York state energy research and development authority to administer a program to provide grants or loans for the costs related to enabling switching residences with propane or fuel-oil heating systems to efficient electric heat pumps.
LawCode: Amd ยง1854, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing the New York state energy research and development authority to administer a program to provide grants related to switching residences to electric heat pumps
